sentences.en: an area patrolled by special police units
sentences.cn: 由特警部队巡逻的地区

sentences.en: Dummy patrol cars will be set up beside motorways to frighten speeding motorists.
sentences.cn: 高速公路旁将安装仿真巡逻车以威慑那些超速驾车者。

sentences.en: Guards patrol the perimeter of the estate.
sentences.cn: 保安人员在庄园四周巡逻。

sentences.en: He failed to return from a patrol.
sentences.cn: 他去巡逻，然后没再回来。

sentences.en: He hurried through the rain, to the patrol car.
sentences.cn: 他冒着雨急匆匆地跑到巡逻车前。

sentences.en: Highway patrol officers closed the road.
sentences.cn: 公路巡警关闭了这条路。

sentences.en: I ask the mounted patrol to keep their eyes open.
In Tobruk, leading a patrol in no-man's land, he was blown up by a mortar bomb.
sentences.cn: 他带领巡逻队在图卜鲁格无人区巡逻时遭迫击炮弹击中身亡.

sentences.en: Security forces remained on patrol until late into the night.
sentences.cn: 保安部队继续巡逻至深夜。

sentences.en: The army is now on patrol in Srinagar and a curfew has been imposed.
sentences.cn: 军队目前在斯利那加巡逻，且已实行了宵禁。

sentences.en: The men apparently opened fire after they were challenged by a patrol.
sentences.cn: 显然，那些人是在受到一支巡逻队的盘问后开的火。

sentences.en: The patrol have [ has ] reported that all is quiet.
sentences.cn: 巡逻队 报告一切平安无事.

sentences.en: The scouts paired off and began to patrol the area.
sentences.cn: 巡逻人员两个一组,然后开始巡逻这个地区.

sentences.en: The security forces increased their patrols in the area.
sentences.cn: 安全部队加强了对该地区的巡逻。

sentences.en: They attacked two soldiers on patrol.
sentences.cn: 他们袭击了两名正在巡逻的士兵.

sentences.en: They made hourly patrol of the area.
sentences.cn: 他们在该地带每小时巡逻一次.
